bill_title: allow for the transfer of Harmony Hill to the State of South Dakota.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow for the transfer of money from a school district's special education fund to its general fund under certain circumstances. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If a school district has made expenditures out of its general fund that could have been made out of its special education fund or transferred money out of its general fund to its special education fund, then the school district may at any time transfer from its special education fund to its general fund an amount of money equal to those previous general fund expenditures and previous transfers from its general fund to its special education fund. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow for the transfer of money from a school district's special education fund to its general fund under certain circumstances. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If a school district that contracts pursuant to § 13-15-11 transferred money out of its general fund to its special education fund in the school years ending June 30, 1993, and June 30, 1994, then the school district may at any time transfer from its special education fund to its general fund an amount of money equal to those previous transfers from its general fund to its special education fund. Section 2. Section 1 of this Act is repealed on July 1, 2000. BILL HISTORY 1/27/99 First read in House and referred to Education. H.J. 209 2/2/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/4/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/9/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/9/99 Education Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 1. H.J. 431

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow for the transfer of Harmony Hill to the State of South Dakota. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Governor, pursuant to § 5-24-12, is hereby authorized to accept, on behalf of the State of South Dakota, the transfer of the former Harmony Hill girls school from the Benedictine Sisters. BILL HISTORY 1/27/99 First read in House and referred to Education. H.J. 209 2/2/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/4/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/9/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/9/99 Education Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 1. S.J. 487 2/25/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/25/99 Education Do Pass, Passed, AYES 6, NAYS 0. S.J. 675 2/26/99 Senate Deferred to another day. S.J. 702 3/1/99 Senate Deferred to another day. S.J. 725 3/2/99 Senate Deferred to another day. S.J. 744 3/3/99 Motion to Amend, Passed. 3/3/99 Senate Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 34, NAYS 0. 3/3/99 Senate Title Amended Passed.
